concept.title: Maths Overview
concept.shortdesc: Provides operations relating to real numbers.

section.title: Architectural relationships
section.p: Types for integer and single-precision and double-precision floating-point numbers are defined by the Basic Types API.
The Descriptors API provides functions that convert real numbers to strings.

section.title: Description
section.p: Functionality is provided by a number of APIs. Use them as follows:
Provides advanced mathematical operations on real numbers.

p.xref: Character Representation Of Real Numbers Overview

section.p: Defines the format of a real number type when it is converted into a string.
